Wind
In southwest, southeasterly 6 to gale 8. In northeast, southerly or southeasterly 3 to 5.
Sea state

In southwest, occasional rain or snow. In northeast, fair.
Visibility
In southwest, moderate or good, occasionally very poor. In northeast, good.
